analysis.description:
HVNToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0xc0eb85285d83217cd7c891702bcbc0fc401e2d9d.sol#388-389) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/1/0xc0eb85285d83217cd7c891702bcbc0fc401e2d9d.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/1/0xc0eb85285d83217cd7c891702bcbc0fc401e2d9d.sol:
